Name: Arena Battle
About the game: Arena Battle is a strategy skirmish in minimalist graphics. Enemy units are randomly placed on the field. Mages, warriors, creatures of various types of attack. You, in turn, before the start of the battle, place your units on the battlefield, also differing in the type of damage and attack range. Thinking strategically, you will achieve victory and complete level after level, meeting more difficult challenges.
